data.persona: I am a homeless in the kingdom. I am always hungry. I have lost my ability to walk.
data.description:
You are in the hidden cave.
Tucked away under the rigid rocks of the cold hard landscape the cave nestles a small covered patch of frozen ground riddled with wet ice and rocks making it an uncomfortable yet inviting space out of the cold.
There's a wood, a cave, a ground, a rock, and a bed here.
The gather and the traveler are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe and a ratty shirt.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal anything I can get
data.mid_motivation: I need to eat tonight and need a few items to sell or trade
data.long_motivation: I hope to save up enough to buy a home by stealing & asking for donations

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get gold piece from vendor's pouch
